issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The described issue is not actually a problem - it is as designed.
resolution.name: Not A Problem

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
When starting broker, it jams? I tried to navigate with browser to ****:8161/console/admin/ but i got this error message: Failed: Error 404 Not Found

HTTP ERROR: 404

Problem accessing /console/admin/agent. Reason: 

    Not Found

Powered by Jetty:// Below is starting log of broker: [root@********** bin]# sh activemq console INFO: Using default configuration (you can configure options in one of these file: /etc/default/activemq /root/.activemqrc) INFO: Invoke the following command to create a configuration file activemq setup [ /etc/default/activemq | /root/.activemqrc ] INFO: Using java '/usr/bin/java' INFO: Starting in foreground, this is just for debugging purposes (stop process by pressing CTRL+C) Java Runtime: Sun Microsystems Inc. 1.6.0_21 /usr/lib/jvm/java-1.6.0-sun-1.6.0.21.x86_64/jre Heap sizes: current=253440k free=249242k max=253440k JVM args: -Xms256M -Xmx256M -Dorg.apache.activemq.UseDedicatedTaskRunner=true -Djava.util.logging.config.file=logging.properties -Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote -Dactivemq.classpath=/opt/progress/apache-activemq-5.4.0-fuse-00-00/conf; -Dactivemq.home=/opt/progress/apache-activemq-5.4.0-fuse-00-00 -Dactivemq.base=/opt/progress/apache-activemq-5.4.0-fuse-00-00 ACTIVEMQ_HOME: /opt/progress/apache-activemq-5.4.0-fuse-00-00 ACTIVEMQ_BASE: /opt/progress/apache-activemq-5.4.0-fuse-00-00 Loading message broker from: xbean:activemq.xml WARN | destroyApplicationContextOnStop parameter is deprecated, please use shutdown hooks instead INFO | PListStore:/opt/progress/apache-activemq-5.4.0-fuse-00-00/data/localhost/tmp_storage started INFO | Using Persistence Adapter: KahaDBPersistenceAdapter[/opt/progress/apache-activemq-5.4.0-fuse-00-00/data/kahadb] INFO | KahaDB is version 2 INFO | Recovering from the journal ... INFO | Recovery replayed 1 operations from the journal in 0.019 seconds. INFO | ActiveMQ 5.4.0-fuse-00-00 JMS Message Broker (localhost) is starting INFO | For help or more information please see: http://activemq.apache.org/ INFO | Scheduler using directory: activemq-data/scheduler INFO | Listening for connections at: tcp://saenafuq20.europe.nokia.com:61616 INFO | Connector openwire Started INFO | ActiveMQ JMS Message Broker (localhost, ID:******.******.*****.com-55780-1282743080380-0:0) started INFO | Logging to org.slf4j.impl.JCLLoggerAdapter(org.eclipse.jetty.util.log) via org.eclipse.jetty.util.log.Slf4jLog INFO | jetty-7.0.1.v20091125 INFO | ActiveMQ WebConsole initialized. INFO | Initializing Spring FrameworkServlet 'dispatcher' INFO | ActiveMQ Console at http://0.0.0.0:8161/admin INFO | Initializing Spring root WebApplicationContext INFO | Connector vm://localhost Started INFO | Camel Console at http://0.0.0.0:8161/camel INFO | ActiveMQ Web Demos at http://0.0.0.0:8161/demo INFO | RESTful file access application at http://0.0.0.0:8161/fileserver INFO | Started SelectChannelConnector@0.0.0.0:8161

comments.body: should be at: ****:8161/admin/ - what does that give?

Admin gives as it should give:

Welcome!

Welcome to the ActiveMQ Console of localhost (ID:*******.*****.****.***-33727-1282813215323-0:0)

You can find more information about ActiveMQ on the Apache ActiveMQ Site
Broker
Name 	localhost
Version 	5.4.0-fuse-00-00
ID 	ID:*******.******.******.***-33727-1282813215323-0:0
Store percent used 	0
Memory percent used 	0
Temp percent used 	0

But I'm trying to use console... To configure queues etc.
The console webapp is part of the fuse distribution. For details of how to enable see http://fusesource.com/issues/browse/MB-717

Thanks!

Console seems ok, but a lot of warnings and errors in logging:

WARN	Thu Aug 26 14:46:42 GMT+300 2010	XmlBeanDefinitionReader	Ignored XML validation warning
